mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_idx, c.user_idx, c.item_idx, m.user_id, i.item_number, i.item_name, i.item_img, i.item_sale_price, c.item_order_amount, (item_sale_price * item_order_amount) item_order_price FROM cart AS c INNER JOIN items AS i ON c.item_idx = i.idx INNER JOIN members AS m ON c.user_idx = m.user_index

SELECT c.cart_idx, c.user_idx, c.item_idx, m.user_id, i.item_number, i.item_name, i.item_img, i.item_sale_price, c.item_order_amount, (item_sale_price * item_order_amount) item_order_price FROM cart AS c INNER JOIN items AS i ON c.item_idx = i.idx INNER JOIN members AS m ON c.user_idx = m.user_index WHERE c.user_idx = #{user_idx} ORDER BY c.cart_idx ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_idx, user_idx, item_idx, item_order_amount) VALUES ( 0, #{user_idx}, #{item_idx}, #{item_order_amount} )
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(item_sale_price * item_order_amount) item_order_price FROM cart AS c INNER JOIN items AS i WHERE c.item_idx = i.idx AND c.user_idx = #{user_idx}
